originalText.text:
My long time  ophthalmologist( 15years) has never been able to improve my long distance vision for one contact.   I had an optometrist do an evaluation as well and she could not help me.  I overheard a friend talking about her fabulous doctor who had cured her long  time problem, Dr. Rosin.  Of course I made an appointment immediately. He is professional and kind.  Just as important, he solved my problem within an hour !!!!  I can finally see my opponentâ€™s face on the tennis court and see the signs on the highway!
Many thanks to my friend for the referral and more to Dr. Rosin ðŸ˜Š

originalText.text: True expert in all refractions and eye care. I am extremely pleased by the Doctor's expertise and the professional office staff. Also great and fast selection of eyewear. I and my family will no longer go anywhere else for our eye checkups.

text.text: True expert in all refractions and eye care. I am extremely pleased by the Doctor's expertise and the professional office staff. Also great and fast selection of eyewear. I and my family will no longer go anywhere else for our eye checkups.

originalText.text:
I had the pleasure of meeting Dr Rosin to check my eyes. I love this office, clean sharp latest equipments staff amazing and my new contacts feel so natural
Highly recommend Dr Rosin to have your eyes checked for new prescription or just annual check up
Thank you

originalText.text: I got a little scared and confused with the address- I thought that it was 35 78th St. I brought all of my shoes and my classes with me to the appointment so I would have them. My eyes was goin crazy, but they fixed my glasses in no time. I can see once again when I go to the observatory at the Empire State Building. Fantastic then!

originalText.text: His office and staff are nice.  He  is very knowledgeable in optometry.  He is thorough and exacting in his examinations.  He is informative in educating you with concern to your situation. He is a nice caring guy.
